caption.p: NPA results of the COPD cases. a: Patients with acute exacerbation of COPD and stable COPD with or without microorganisms detected in the NPA. b: Percentages of individual microorganism found in NPA in the subjects. ADV = adenovirus; B. Pertussis = Bordetella pertussis; CoV=Coronavirus; Flu A = influenza A; Flu B = influenza B; HBoV = Human Bocavirus; HMPV = Human metapneumovirus; HPIV=Human parainfluenza virus; M pneumoniae = Mycoplasma pneumoniae; HRVs = Human rhinovirus; RSV = Respiratory syncytial virus
